sentences.en: An Ontology - driven scheme to construct text virtual sample is proposed.

sentences.en: Hence, in a certain sense, phenomenology is equal to ontology.

sentences.en: In fact, in Cartesian ontology there are only three kinds of substance: mind, matter and God.
sentences.cn: 其实在笛卡尔的本体论中，世界上只有三种实体：心灵、物质和上帝。
